# Instructions for downloading and installing the QTI Migration Tool

= Mac OS X =

Users of Mac OS X can download the Mac OS X disk image file (.dmg) features in the [http://code.google.com/p/qtimigration/downloads/list downloads section of the site].

= Windows =

A Windows installer is in preparation.

= Other/Source =

Other UNIX-based platforms should use the source distribution instead (currently by checking out the trunk of the source tree).
